Articles.Content:
Well, after the crash and loss of data (Though thanks to squad, we still have a very usable forum ) I've decided to just re-post, and also show-off a few new craft:

F22-Raptor:

Albeit not how I usually name my craft, it is a very, VERY stable craft, and I find it quite hard to make it go out of control at lower altitudes, and also has great handling without the assist of ASAS.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5rwEMrwJOZZVF9GVWZaZWVkY00/edit?usp=sharing

Arctan-I:

A small cruiser I created, almost reminds me of the battle cruiser from Starcraft.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5rwEMrwJOZZdjNQaVhoUHFNSjA/edit?usp=sharing

Venator-class Star Destroyer:

An attempt at recreating a Star Destroyer, and I thought it went quite well. At 907 parts (Since it was built in .18), be prepared to have a melted computer.

*Has a fully traversable interior, and 'attack capabilities.'

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5rwEMrwJOZZRHJMNXFiY0pSU0E/edit

FTL Egg:

Finnaly, my most beloved 'craft,' the FTL (Forget-the-logic) Egg. It is quite efficient at harnessing the power of the Kraken to induce headaches for physics.

*When using this craft, advance stage to detach egg, EVA out of pod, and attempt to grab hold of the ladder inside the egg.

Note: Wear a heat-resistant suit.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5rwEMrwJOZZaXcxdGhsaGptSmc/edit

Edited April 21, 2013 by A Fat Pokemon
